section.title: Image Tasks (Importing and Exporting Images)
section.para: A image task is a request to perform an asynchronous image-related operation, such as importing or exporting an image. The request results in the creation of a disposable task resource that can be polled for information about the status of the operation.

Once you initiate an import or export, poll the status of the task using "GET_getTask_v2_tasks__taskID__Image_Task_Calls"
Section 4.4.2. "Get Task Details". When the task resource reaches a final status of success or failure, the poll response will include an expiration date and time stamp. After that expiration time, the disposable task resource itself expires and is subject to deletion. However, the result of the task, such as an imported or exported image, does not expire.

note.para:
Tasks are defined in the OpenStack Images v2 API. They provide a uniform interface for image task functionality across OpenStack installations. Because OpenStack cloud providers may have quite different implementations, tasks have been designed so that individual providers can easily customize them. Thus, each task resource contains input and result parameters. The "POST_importTask_v2_tasks_Image_Task_Calls"
Section 4.4.3. "Import Task", and "POST_exportTask_v2_tasks_Image_Task_Calls"
Section 4.4.4. "Export Task" operations show what Rackspace requires for these parameters. Other cloud providers may define these parameters differently.

section.para:
To import an image, do the following:
Put the image into your Cloud Files account.
Submit the import request "POST_importTask_v2_tasks_Image_Task_Calls"
Section 4.4.2. "Import Task".
The &CImS; will fetch the image from your cloud storage and create a new image for you.
Poll the task status using "GET_getTask_v2_tasks__taskID__Image_Task_Calls"
Section 4.4.2. "Get Task Details" until the task completes.

To export an image, do the following:
Determine the UUID of the image you want to export.
Submit the export request "POST_exportTask_v2_tasks_Image_Task_Calls"
Section 4.4.3. "Export Task".
The &CImS; processes the image, converts it to a convenient format for a future export of the image to another cloud (or to another region of the Rackspace cloud), and transfers the exported image to your Cloud Files account.
Poll the task status using "GET_getTask_v2_tasks__taskID__Image_Task_Calls"
Section 4.4.2. "Get Task Details" until the task completes.

section.title: Task Statuses
section.para: Image Tasks in the &CImS; can have one of the following statuses when polled:

listitem.para: The image task is waiting for execution.
